name: 3D Museum Fantastyca
description:
Looking for a relaxing walk in a virtual place?

You play as a visitor of an digital museum. Along the way you encounter different pieces and relicts that have been recreated from their physical form into a digital version.
I invite you to slender through the four unique rooms and admire their exhibits.

- Not recommended for a Potato-PC > Heavy geometry.
- This is a personal project to learn and play around with Unity. Hope you enjoy it!
